recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.procedure: Boil spaghetti. Cook pancetta in a pan. Mix eggs and Parmesan. Combine spaghetti, pancetta, and egg mixture. Serve with pepper and Parmesan.

recipes.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.procedure: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. Grill or pan-fry. Cook onions, tomatoes, and spices for sauce. Add cream and chicken. Simmer and serve with rice.

recipes.name: Sushi Rolls
recipes.procedure: Cook sushi rice and season with vinegar. Place seaweed on a mat. Add rice, fillings (e.g., fish, cucumber). Roll tightly, slice, and serve.

recipes.name: Tacos
recipes.procedure: Prepare fillings like seasoned meat, lettuce, and cheese. Warm tortillas. Assemble with toppings and serve.

recipes.name: French Onion Soup
recipes.procedure: Caramelize onions in butter. Add beef broth, thyme, and wine. Simmer. Serve with toasted bread and melted cheese on top.
